programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.sub-title: Used Tissue of Doom/When Mascots Attack.
programme.desc: Double bill. Thera is hoping to win a gold medal for speed skating. Her dream is threatened when Noam's super-cure for the cold creates mutant flying tissues which try to give her the virus. Then, after Lars's lame Growly the Gopher mascot becomes cool, the cheerleading Trishas help the opposing team to create a mega mascot to do battle with Growly

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Last Stall on the Left/Got Stank.
programme.desc: Double bill. New kid Randy Cunningham is the latest in a long line of ninjas who have protected Norrisville High School for 800 years. On his first day at school he faces danger. Randy and Howard try to get themselves into the cool seats for the school game by painting themselves with blue body paint

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Gossip Boy/The Tale of the Golden Doctor's Note.
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard accidentally tells everyone he knows the identity of the ninja, and is promptly kidnapped by McFist. Then, Randy hunts for a mythical golden doctor's note

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer and Billy make a music video. Then, Billy's ectoplasm-smeared fur coat turns Spencer into a werewolf

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer cooks up a scheme to get Ponzi fired, but the new principal turns out to be even worse. Then, Spencer arranges for Billy's pet to be brought home

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. The villainous pet creates an army of flea-sized mind control nanobots that hop into ears and allow him to control thoughts. Later, he plots to turn Bootsville's water supply into milk, and Coop thinks a cat invasion is imminent

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Cheeks of Evil/Reap It and Weep.
programme.desc: Double bill. Millie brings home Mr Cheeks, the school hamster, who turns out to be a member of an ancient warrior race. He and Kat engage in a very destructive battle. Later, Kat zaps a batch of catnip, and Bootsville suddenly becomes covered in it

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: The Three Mascot-teers/Escape from Scrap City.
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard is chosen to be the new school mascot, while Randy learns it's not always fun to be the best friend of the costumed hero of Norrisville High. Then, McFist and Ninja crash in the dangerous Scrap City and must work together if they are to escape

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Space Cow-Bros/The Fresh Principal of Norrisville High.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy accidentally launches Howard into space with a killer robot aboard. Then, Slimovitz is fired and a computer program takes his place

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster wants to be grown up, so acquires a sushi seaweed moustache - but it's poisonous. Then, Lola is out of work so Boyster's parents decide to move to the big city

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace thinks spending the day with her mother will give her a chance to get the better of the boys

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.sub-title: Days of Future Smash - Part Five: The Tomorrow Smashers.
programme.desc: Part five of five. Finally catching up to Leader in the present, Hulk reunites with the Agents of Smash. However, he is unexpectedly whisked into the future by teenage Smashers

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: While Iron Man and Ant-Man are trying to stablize Pym Particles that can shrink or grow matter, Falcon gives them terrible news that his mom Darlene is coming to visit

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The Guardians get caught up in a palace intrigue with the Inhuman Royal Family, and must help to save their space-faring city of Attilan from Ronan

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Marvel Ultimate Spider-Man vs The Sinister 6: The Spider Slayers - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of three. Spider-Man and Scarlet Spider set about infiltrating the sunken Hydra Island so Scarlet can destroy the lab that created him

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Phineas and Ferb Get Busted (aka At Last).
programme.desc: Candace thinks her dreams have come true when her mother returns and sends the boys to military school, but she soon begins to miss her brothers

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Greece Lightning/Leave the Busting to Us.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys stage a motorised chariot race after being inspired by Greek mythology. Candace is determined to catch them out when they build a giant water slide

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Phineas and Ferb: The OWCA Files.
programme.desc: Professor Parenthesis launches an attack on OWCA, incapacitating the animal agents with robotic fleas, and only Agent P and his trainees can save the day

programme.title: Unlocking the Mech
programme.desc: Compilation of shorts, featuring characters fighting robots and monsters, as well as showcasing new features of the Mech, and cool new gadgets like Mech-Links and X-Goggles

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: The unexpected pranks get smellier and wilder when Uncle Will, Chance and Dusty pull off a fake commercial for Stank Be Gone foot spray and trick another target into thinking he's transporting a wild rhinoceros to the zoo

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: Alan's driving lessons with Parker take a much more urgent turn when burglars kidnap Lady Penelope and Aunt Sylvia. Action adventure, with the voices of Rasmus Hardiker, David Graham, Rosamund Pike and Sylvia Anderson

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: That's the Spirit/The Curse of Candace.
programme.desc: Double bill of Halloween episodes. The boys rid a house of ghosts, Doof becomes a were-cow, and the boys invent a mind-controlling gadget, which they use to make Candace think she is a vampire. The YP are resigned to their fate, all but Tyler, who faces a race against time to expose Mr. Umbleby. Trying to prove his innocence, Alex faces an uphill battle for redemption.
